title: Loner

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Teammates Needed**
- If this is rolled, the Coven may only have 1 member (that being this role).
**Jack Of Some Trades**
- This role will gain 2 random abilities from 2 random Coven roles.
- Rule 17 applies, but in games where Coven is the only REF, they must roll *until* it's overpowered.
**necronomicon thing**
- On N3 (or whenever the necronomicon activates this game), this role may choose any Coven role, and replace an ability they have with an ability from that role. They keep this ability for the rest of the game (1 use)

desc:
Post 4286
"Oh I'm sorry, but i work alone. I'll gladly take ideas though!"
